content: {"name": "Montgomery College - Germantown Campus Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Each of the three main campuses has a pantry stocked with snacks, food, personal hygiene products, and household items. As an MC student, you are welcome to pick up a snack to carry you through your next class and to take a few items home.\n* Location: Dr. DeRionne P. Pollard Student Affairs and Science Building, SA149", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20200 Observation Dr.", "address_2": null, "city": "Germantown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20876", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.186621, "longitude": -77.247154}, "phones": [{"number": "(251) 744-4411", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "09:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "09:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "09:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "09:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "09:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Student ID required"}]}
